meanings.definition: Having two cotyledons in the seed.
meanings.sent1: The dicotyledonous plant grew quickly in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Dicotyledonous plants are common in many gardens.
meanings.sent3: The dicotyledonous seed seemed to wink at the sun as it sprouted.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a sea of dicotyledonous plants, like a patchwork quilt of green.
meanings.sent5: The image of the dicotyledonous seed splitting open was etched in her mind.

meanings.definition: A plant having two seed leaves.
meanings.sent1: I planted a dicotyledonous in my backyard.
meanings.sent2: The dicotyledonous in the park looked vibrant and healthy.
meanings.sent3: The dicotyledonous in the flower bed told jokes to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The dicotyledonous stood out in the garden like a pair of green wings.
meanings.sent5: The dicotyledonous swayed gently in the breeze, a symbol of new life.
